parameter.name: Application Path
parameter.description: Full site path where you would like to install your application (i.e., Default Web Site/PhotoGallery)

parameter.name: SetAclParameter1
parameter.description: Hidden - automatically sets write access for the app

parameter.name: Database Name
parameter.description: Name of the database for your application.

parameter.name: Database Username
parameter.description: User name to access you application database.

parameter.name: Database Administrator Password
parameter.description: Password that is associated with the database administrator account.

parameter.name: Create DB and DB User Connection String
parameter.description: Automatically sets the connection string for the connection request.
parameter.defaultValue: Server={Database Server};Database={Database Name};uid={Database Administrator};Pwd={Database Administrator Password};

parameter.name: Populate DB Connection String
parameter.description: Automatically sets the connection string for the connection request.
parameter.defaultValue: Server={Database Server};Database={Database Name};uid={Database Administrator};Pwd={Database Administrator Password};

parameter.name: Connection String for Config
parameter.description: Connection string to enter into config
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source={Database Server};database={Database Name};user id={Database Username};password={Database Password}
